column4: hi, none of my applications can connect to servers for updates
i cant even use apt-get install
I cant install any applications or download updates for ubuntu
make sure your internet connection is working :D
with all due respect, I am here chatting so...
what ISP?
I am at university accomodation which provide the internet
ping google.com
did it ever work at university?
I was able to get it to work for a few things and pidgin worked too but now everything has stopped
google ping return 100% packets lost
that's bad :)
maybe you could check with someone (at the university) else whether they can ping google or not....
I think people can, I have a friend who uses ubuntu as his main os too
His not around so i cant be sure, but right now i just want to get my IM working
are you using a proxy?
yes I am behind a proxy. I tried to set it up too
have Pidgin ever worked at the university for you?
Yes it worked, only stopped working recently.
well... It might be that the mirror is the problem and MSN is also down... and there is nothing wrong with you :D
I asked the guys in the pidgin chat room and they said it was problem on my end.
try to set your MSN account (on the advanced tab) to use the HTTP method
ill try that now
